He now has some 40 years experience raising pigs and hens.

This loan will be used to buy a couple of pigs and to look after the animals and improve their living conditions.  Virgilio is taking out this loan with the objective of having a higher income at the end of the season.  He is grateful to "Fundación Campo" and for the support provided to cover the necessary costs of increasing his herd.  Virgilio hopes to continue working with the organisation so as to see his community develop.

Virigilio is thinking about taking out another loan in the future so as to better establish his crops and to continue raising pigs.  He may also try other work which will provide him with an income in order to support his family.

loans.use: to buy a couple of pigs and to look after the animals and improve their living conditions.

loans.name: Dora

texts.es: Dora, de 20 años, está casada y es madre de un niño de 03 años con quien vive en su casa propia. El trabajo de Dora consiste en la compra de racimos de plátano de las comunidades alrededor de la ciudad. Luego los vende desde su casa y en algunas ocasiones sale a venderlos en la calle, entre sus vecinos, amigos y familiares, siempre tiene plátanos frescos y de muy buena calidad. Lleva trabajando con esta actividad ya por 03 años, su esposo la apoya en la distribución por la ciudad. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede contar con un ingreso extra y así apoya a la economía de su hogar, lo considera rentable por que tiene muy buena demanda, espera seguir creciendo con este trabajo que le esta ayudando a mejorar muchos aspectos de su vida. Por tanto éste será su segundo préstamo con Kiva y agradece mucho a la institución por el apoyo brindado ya que le sirve para tener mayor capital y  traer productos en mayor cantidad.Con el monto solicitado de S/.1000 soles, comprara plátanos al por mayor para después revenderlos.
texts.en: Dora, 20 years old, is married, she is mother to a 3 year old child, with whom she lives in her own home. Dora's work involves buying bunches of plátanos (a fruit similar to bananas) from communities around the city. She then sells them from home and on some occasions she sells them on the street, to her neighbours, friends and family. She always has fresh plátanos of very good quality. She has been working in this job for the past 3 years, and her husband helps her with distribution in the city. What she likes about this job is that she can earn extra income and improve her household earnings. She considers the job profitable because there is very good demand for her produce. She hopes that her workload will grow and it is helping to improve many aspects of her life. This will be her second loan with Kiva and she is very thankful to the institution for its support as it provides greater capital with which she can purchase products in greater quantities. With the amount requested (S/. 1000 soles), she will buy plátanos wholesale and then resell them.

loans.use: to buy plátanos wholesale

loans.name: Nelli

texts.en:
Nelli is a skilled hairdresser from Vanadzor town. She lives with her husband and 4-year-old son. 
Nelli started her hairdresser career 2 years ago and due to her hard work has already gained many loyal customers. Nelli works at a local beauty salon and during her free time provides the same services at home. The business model of the beauty salon is such that Nelli gets only 50% of the total daily revenue.

Over years of hard work, Nelli was able to gain a client base that are using only her services. So, in order to increase her income she has decided to work only at home. Now Nelli needs financial support for purchasing a hair dryer, scissors and other working tools specialized for her work. Nelli requested a loan from local financial institutions several times, but without any success. Her loan request was rejected every time because her business isn't registered as a formal business. Nelli has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. So this loan will greatly assist Nelly and will give her a chance to develop her business.

loans.use: to pay for a hair dryer, scissors and other working tools for providing hairdresser services.

loans.name: Lucinda

texts.es: Lucinda, de 28 años de edad, está casada con Libio quien es comerciante y padre de sus 3 hijos  de 11,  07 y 03 años de edad. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. Lucinda se dedica a alquilar su mototaxi el cual adquirió con el apoyo de su pareja, este vehículo es alquilado a una persona responsable. Se inició hace más de 05 años, comprando su vehículo con los ahorros mutuos con su pareja renovando su vehiculo con el desgaste por el trabajo, también lo conduce en sus ratios libres. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias que le deja y la demanda que tiene el público de este servicio.Por tanto, viendo los resultados de su negocio, tiene deseos de continuar y aumentar el número de unidades vehiculares. Este es su primer préstamo con Kiva y está agradecido por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Con el monto solicitado de 600 nuevos soles, comprará de repuestos de motos como llantas y otros para dar mantenimiento a su vehículo, buscando precios cómodos por sus compras.
texts.en:
Lucinda, 28 years old, is married to Libio, who is a merchant and father of their 3 children aged 11, 7, and 3. They live together in their own house. 

Lucinda rents out her mototaxi, which she purchased with the help of her partner. This vehicle is leased to a responsible person. She began more than 5 years ago, purchasing the vehicle with the couple's mutual savings. She repairs the vehicle from wear and tear, and also drives it in her free time. She considers her business quite profitable based on the earnings it brings her and the public's demand for this service. As a result, seeing the results of her business, she wants to move forward and increase the number of vehicles. 

This is her first loan with Kiva and she is grateful for the financial support that she receives to get ahead. As well, she promises to make her repayments promptly. With the requested 600 nuevos soles, she will purchase replacement parts for her motorcycle, such as tires and other things, to maintain the vehicle, searching for a good price for these purchases.

loans.use: to purchase replacement parts for her vehicle.

loans.name: Eti

texts.en:
The Story of Siti, daughter of Eti:

I came from an unpretentious family. I am the oldest child in my family. My two younger siblings still need money to fund their school and I don't want to stop studying either. But, given my family condition, it's hard for me to continue my studies in senior high school. 

My father works as a laborer in construction with no stable income. My mother works as a maid to help our family. However, the money they get is still far from enough for our family. By joining this Kiva program, I hope I can continue my study at vocational school.

loans.use: To pay for education fees at the vocational school

loans.name: Mad

texts.en:
The story of Tedi, son of Mad:

I came from an unpretentious family. I am the oldest child in my family. My two younger siblings still need money to fund their school and I don't want to stop studying either. But, given my family condition, it's hard for me to continue my studies in senior high school. My father works as a share-cropper with no stable income. By joining this Kiva program, I hope I can continue my study at vocational school.

loans.use: To pay for education fees at the vocational school

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase and run one Fresh Life toilet.
